name: Meloetta - Pirouette
description: The Melody Pokémon. Many famous songs have been inspired by the melodies that Meloetta plays.

abilities.name: Serene Grace
abilities.description: The Move DC to pass a saving throw against one of this Pokémon's moves is increased by 1.

abilities.name: Form Change
abilities.description: As long as Meloetta is outside of battle, it assumes Aria Forme. When the move Relic Song is used, Meloettta interchanges between Aria Forme and Pirouette Forme.
